name: Green Acai Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Granola, kiwi slices, and chia seeds (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen acai puree, banana, spinach, pineapple, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Top with granola, kiwi slices, and chia seeds
Optional: Add fresh berries, hemp hearts, or coconut flakes
